Uses of Package
org.codehaus.preon

Packages that use org.codehaus.preon
org.codehaus.preon The package providing the API allowing you to construct your own Codecs, and to extend the way Codecs are constructed. 
org.codehaus.preon.binding The package providing the interface as well as some default implementations of objects responsible for mediating between Codecs and Fields. 
org.codehaus.preon.codec The package providing some default CodecFactories, supporting a number of different Codecs. 
org.codehaus.preon.descriptor The package currently providing a default CodecDescriptor. 
org.codehaus.preon.el The package providing classes to bridge between Limbo and Preon. 
org.codehaus.preon.util The package providing some utility classes, supporting the construction of Codecs. 
 

Classes in org.codehaus.preon used by org.codehaus.preon
Builder
          The interface to be implemented by objects with the capability to create default instances of arbitrary types being passed in.
Codec
          The interface to be implemented by objects that are able to decode/encode objects.
CodecConstructionException
          The exception thrown when a CodecFactory fails to construct a Codec.
CodecDecorator
          A factory for Codec decorators.
CodecDescriptor
           
CodecDescriptor.Adjective
          An enumeration with different adjectives.
CodecException
          The base exception class for any kind of problem that might occur while encoding/decoding.
CodecFactory
          A factory for Codecs.
Codecs.DocumentType
          An enumeration of potential documentation types.
CodecSelector
          The interface to be implemented by objects that have the capability to select a Codec based on data on the buffer and a context for resolving references.
DecodingException
          The exception thrown when the Codec fails to decode a value from the BitBuffer.
Resolver
          A simple interface for resolving variable values.
ResolverContext
          A convenience interface, defining a ReferenceContext of Resolver.

Classes in org.codehaus.preon used by org.codehaus.preon.codec
Builder
          The interface to be implemented by objects with the capability to create default instances of arbitrary types being passed in.
Codec
          The interface to be implemented by objects that are able to decode/encode objects.
CodecConstructionListener
          An interface implemented by some objects to notify listeners that new Codecs were created.
CodecDecorator
          A factory for Codec decorators.
CodecDescriptor
           
CodecFactory
          A factory for Codecs.
CodecSelector
          The interface to be implemented by objects that have the capability to select a Codec based on data on the buffer and a context for resolving references.
CodecSelectorFactory
          A factory for creating CodecSelectors.
DecodingException
          The exception thrown when the Codec fails to decode a value from the BitBuffer.
Resolver
          A simple interface for resolving variable values.
ResolverContext
          A convenience interface, defining a ReferenceContext of Resolver.
